snippet: Diageo will receive $780.5 million in cash and Heineken’s holdings in a Ghanaian brewer, and Heineken will get the distribution rights for Red Stripe in the United States.
abstract: DealBook Online; Diageo and Heineken announce agreement to swap assets in Ghana, Jamaica, Malaysia and Singapore that will result in $780.5 million cash payment to Diageo.
lead_paragraph: Diageo will receive $780.5 million in cash and Heineken’s holdings in a Ghanaian brewer, and Heineken will get the distribution rights for Red Stripe in the United States.

headline.main: Diageo and Heineken Agree to Swap Assets in Beer Businesses
